column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The Ribeye was perfectly cooked the way we wanted it (MEDIUM RARE of course). The outside was nicely cooked where the insides were a perfect medium rare. They provided this steak salt seasoning to add on to your steak
column2: but that was not needed as the steak was full of flavor already. It said on the menu that it would e 22 oz
column3: and we figured the bone to weigh the most
column5: there was barely a bone to this bone-in ribeye. Two people sharing this dish is the perfect amount to be honest.
